es.uam.eps.padsof.tickets

Interface ITicketInfo


  • public interface ITicketInfo
    An interface to describe the necessary information for a custom ticket. Objects conforming to this interface are consumed by the TicketSystem class.
    Author:
    Profesores PADSOF

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      default java.lang.String getExhibitionCenterName() 
      default java.lang.String getExhibitionName()

      default double getPrice() 
      default java.lang.String getTicketDateTime() 

    • Method Detail

      • getIdTicket

        int getIdTicket()
        Returns:
        The identifier of the ticket.

      • getExhibitionCenterName

        default java.lang.String getExhibitionCenterName()
        Returns:
        The name of the exhibition center.

      • getExhibitionName

        default java.lang.String getExhibitionName()
        Returns:
        The name of the exhibition.

      • getNumberOfTickets

        default int getNumberOfTickets()
        Returns:
        The number of purchased tickets.

      • getTicketDateTime

        default java.lang.String getTicketDateTime()
        Returns:
        The date and hour for which the tickets have been purchased.

      • getPrice

        default double getPrice()
        Returns:
        The price of the tickets without applying any discounts.

      • getDiscount

        default double getDiscount()
        Returns:
        The amount to be discounted from the price of the tickets.

      • getPayedPrice

        default double getPayedPrice()
        Returns:
        The final price payed for the tickets after applying the discounts (payed price = price - discount).

      • getPicture

        default java.lang.String getPicture()
        Returns:
        The path of a picture to be displayed in the ticket.
